mapper.select: select sum(tt.order_price)*0.1 as sales, (to_date(to_char(order_date,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') - to_date('19700101','yyyymmdd')) * (1*24*60*60*1000) as order_date from (select distinct order_id, order_price, order_date from( select *from meeting_order where order_flag =1 ))tt group by (to_date(to_char(order_date,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') - to_date('19700101','yyyymmdd')) * (1*24*60*60*1000) order by order_date

select sum(tt.order_price)*0.1 as sales, to_char(order_date,'YYYY-MM') as order_date from (select distinct order_id, order_price, order_date from meeting_order where order_flag=1)tt group by to_char(order_date,'YYYY-MM') order by order_date

select aa.member_name member_name , sum(aa.order_price) sales from (select distinct mo.order_id, mo.order_price order_price, mm.member_name member_name, mm.member_profile, mt.mentor_seq from meeting_order mo, meetingboard mb, mentor mt, mentors_member mm where order_flag = 1 and mo.meetingboard_seq = mb.meetingboard_seq and mb.mentor_email = mt.mentor_email and mt.mentor_email = mm.member_email and mt.mentor_badge = 0)aa group by aa.member_name,aa.member_profile,aa.mentor_seq order by aa.member_name
